TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Pitilidan, title = Pitilidan, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pitilidan} }

S.FORM: Pitilidan (kuwaping a sowal: ) O pitilidan i.Ira ko tato`oren a mikikaena naylon ato cikan ha dodo`en. Ira ko patidengan a loma` pisa`opoan to tamedawmedaw. Hapi linsiwwan. Hapi hatatanaman. O tadala`oc no pi hatatanaman mi tour to citay aca o sa`osi no kitakit, selangasan sararoma. Sa arafinay kitakit a pitilidan no likisio tanotapan a pitilidan i saayaw ni Yis Kristo 597mihacan i tira Inkilis a patiden. Salitengay a pitilidan. I tini to no kowapin a likisi salitengay a pitilidan i tini .Pasifana to sakangaay no pinangan sapalatamdaw. Mi tilid, mi `osi.No sofitay a demak. Anini a citay. O pitilidan ma`ecad o pafanay to sakatayar a demak a tanen .Tangasa o citay hatini ma falicay to ko pinangan. O pitiliday a tamddaw o siwmi ko minanayan nangra .Ca to kami sa`icer a mihatatanam. Lomasa to o pasifanay a singsi o kafana`an ca ningra misimsim to sapa`ini to mi tiliday a tamedaw.
